name: hue Invaders
description: As a tribute to the good old Space Invader game this app directs colored spaceships into your direction. Every time the Philips hue system sets a lamp to a color, you can blast away the spaceship having that particular color. But beware, if you mismatch the color, the spacship will take an extra step in your direction! Once you manage to blow them all away you have won! But if you miss one you are lost.
